divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 9:10pm I went outside and started seeing a light flying slow then speeding up. It moved very fast around the city. Toward dusk and into the night I continually was able to see it and two other starlike objects repeatedly flying back and forth, zooming and slowing down for about an hour and a half. At this time, I can still see them. They are very high in the sky and I don't think satellites can move this quick, nor maneuver as the lights are doing.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There was one other sighting in San Antonio on or around June 4th 2009
